exceptions.tactic: elim r using mreconnaissance_ind; clear r p a t.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables P, P.

In environment p : preDTA a : ad t : term r : reconnaissance p a t p1 : preDTA Unable to unify "reconnaissance (udta_conv_1 ?M1851) (uad_conv_1 ?M1852) ?M1853" with "reconnaissance (u_merge p p1) (uad_conv_0 a) t".

In environment p : preDTA a : ad t : term r : reconnaissance p a t p1 : preDTA Unable to unify "reconnaissance (udta_conv_0 ?M1851) (uad_conv_0 ?M1852) ?M1853" with "reconnaissance (u_merge p p1) (uad_conv_0 a) t".

original: intros p a t r. unfold u_merge_inv_0_dta. unfold u_conv_rec_0. unfold u_conv_rec_1. elim r using mreconnaissance_ind; clear r p a t. - intros. eapply u_conv1. eauto. - intros. eapply u_conv0. eauto.
